Text: Future ArticleI am writing this article for the March issue of Shared Services Newsletter but I thought you might be interested in it While you are not technically a shared service your group has many of the same attributes The idea of selling your services outside Enron may have crossed your mind as you look at certain opportunities Let me know what you think Thanks Mike Campbell Holland Davis Inc Outsourcing Your Shared Service Operationsdoc
